PublishingInfo.Description: Provides Object Detection in Python>=3.8 using YOLOv8. Great for newer NVIDIA GPUs
PublishingInfo.Author: Chris Maunder

ModuleReleases.ReleaseNotes: Fix for 'import' error, addition of 'huge' model
Added thread lock to address multi-threaded issue

RouteMaps.Name: Object Detector (YOLOv8)
RouteMaps.Description: Detects multiple objects, of 80 different possible types, in an image.

Inputs.Name: image
Inputs.Description: The HTTP file object (image) to be analyzed.

Inputs.Name: min_confidence
Inputs.Description: The minimum confidence level for an object will be detected. In the range 0.0 to 1.0. Default 0.4.

Outputs.Name: success
Outputs.Description: True if successful.

Outputs.Name: message
Outputs.Description: A summary of the inference operation.

Outputs.Name: error
Outputs.Description: (Optional) An description of the error if success was false.

Outputs.Name: predictions
Outputs.Description: An array of objects with the x_max, x_min, max, y_min, label and confidence.

Outputs.Name: count
Outputs.Description: The number of objects found.

Outputs.Name: inferenceMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to perform the AI inference.

Outputs.Name: processMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to process the image (includes inference and image manipulation operations).

RouteMaps.Name: Custom Object Detector (YOLOv8)
RouteMaps.Description: Detects objects based on YOLO PyTorch models. Models are stored as .pt files in the /ObjectDetectionYOLOv8/assets directory, and to make a call to a specific model use /vision/custom/model-name, where 'model-name' is the name of the model's .pt file

Inputs.Name: image
Inputs.Description: The HTTP file object (image) to be analyzed.

Inputs.Name: min_confidence
Inputs.Description: The minimum confidence level for an object will be detected. In the range 0.0 to 1.0. Default 0.4.

Outputs.Name: success
Outputs.Description: True if successful.

Outputs.Name: message
Outputs.Description: A summary of the inference operation.

Outputs.Name: error
Outputs.Description: (Optional) An description of the error if success was false.

Outputs.Name: predictions
Outputs.Description: An array of objects with the x_max, x_min, max, y_min, mask, label and confidence.

Outputs.Name: inferenceMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to perform the AI inference.

Outputs.Name: processMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to process the image (includes inference and image manipulation operations).
